commenter_a: This is such BS.. I had my daughter's ears pierced when she was an infant and she felt the pain for 30 seconds. She was completely calm and pain free afterwards. Her ears healed in less than a week bc of how fast her body grew at that time. She had less risk of infection then (she was too young to play w her ears) and less healing time. I, on the other hand, had mine pierced at 6 and ended up with problems bc I took them out when I shouldn't have..
